roleset.note: IMMUNOSTAIN-V NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to immunostaining.01. No Vn or Fn classes. Framed by Katie. (from immunostain.01-v)
IMMUNOSTAINING-N NOTES: Based on stratified and temprel data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from immunostaining.01-n)
